  • Constructor Details

    • DbUtils

      public DbUtils​(java.net.URL pDbConfigFile) throws java.lang.Exception
      Constructor initialize creates the db connections based on the parameters from the the config file. The path to the config file (dbConfig.properties) in the form of a url needs to be passed in here.
      Parameters:
      pDbConfigFile -
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
